scripts.build: pnpm clean && pnpm format && tsc && node gasify.mjs
scripts.deploy: pnpm build && ncp .clasp-dev.json .clasp.json && ncp appsscript.json ./dist/appsscript.json && clasp push
scripts.deploy:prod: pnpm build && ncp .clasp-prod.json .clasp.json && ncp appsscript.json ./dist/appsscript.json && clasp push
